hesai.name: Hesai Technology
hesai.description: Hesai Technology manufactures LiDAR sensors for autonomous vehicles and robotics. Their AI-enhanced sensors help self-driving cars perceive and navigate complex environments.

kuaishou_ai.name: Kuaishou AI
kuaishou_ai.description: Kuaishou's AI division behind Kling video generation and recommendation algorithms.

alibaba_ai.name: Alibaba Cloud AI
alibaba_ai.description: Alibaba's AI services including Tongyi Qianwen LLM and cloud AI platform.

tencent_ai.name: Tencent AI Lab
tencent_ai.description: Tencent AI Lab researches and deploys AI across gaming, social media, and cloud. Their work on NLP, computer vision, and game AI enhances WeChat and QQ experiences.

deepl.name: DeepL
deepl.description: German AI translation company often considered more accurate than Google Translate.

photoroom.name: PhotoRoom
photoroom.description: PhotoRoom uses AI to instantly remove backgrounds and create professional product photos. Their app helps millions of small businesses and creators make studio-quality images on their phones.

dust.name: Dust
dust.description: Dust helps companies build AI assistants that understand their internal knowledge. Their platform connects to company data sources and builds custom AI agents for specific workflows.

doctolib.name: Doctolib
doctolib.description: Doctolib is Europe's leading healthcare scheduling platform, using AI to optimize appointments. Their technology helps patients find doctors and enables practices to manage bookings efficiently.
doctolib.founders: Stanislas Niox-Chateau, Jessy Bernal, Ivan Googer

tractable.name: Tractable
tractable.description: Tractable uses AI to assess vehicle damage from photos instantly. Their technology accelerates insurance claims, helping insurers and repair shops work faster.
tractable.founders: Alex Dalyac, Razvan Ranca, Adrien Cohen

benevolentai.name: BenevolentAI
benevolentai.description: BenevolentAI applies artificial intelligence to discover new medicines. Their Knowledge Graph and AI tools help identify drug targets and design molecules for complex diseases.

cervest.name: Cervest
cervest.description: Cervest uses AI to model climate risk for businesses and assets. Their platform helps organizations understand and adapt to climate change impacts.

onfido.name: Onfido
onfido.description: Onfido verifies identities using AI-powered document and biometric checks. Their technology helps businesses prevent fraud while onboarding customers quickly and securely.
onfido.founders: Husayn Kassai, Eamon Jubbawy, Ruhul Amin

thought_machine.name: Thought Machine
thought_machine.description: Thought Machine provides cloud-native core banking technology with AI capabilities. Their Vault platform helps banks modernize infrastructure and deliver personalized financial products.

spotify_ai.name: Spotify AI
spotify_ai.description: Spotify uses AI for music recommendations, podcast transcription, and now AI DJs. Their algorithms understand listening preferences to personalize the experience for 500M+ users.

sana_labs.name: Sana Labs
sana_labs.description: Sana uses AI to personalize workplace learning. Their platform adapts training content to each employee, improving knowledge retention and skill development.

klarna_ai.name: Klarna AI
klarna_ai.description: Klarna's AI assistant handling customer service with AI replacing 700 agents.

uizard.name: Uizard
uizard.description: Uizard uses AI to transform sketches and screenshots into editable designs. Their platform helps product teams create app mockups and prototypes from simple drawings.
uizard.founders: Tony Beltramelli, Florian Schreiber, Henrik Haugb√∏lle

corti.name: Corti
corti.description: Corti uses AI to assist emergency dispatchers and healthcare providers during calls. Their technology analyzes conversations in real-time to help identify critical conditions faster.

connectly.name: Connectly
connectly.description: Connectly enables businesses to engage customers through AI-powered WhatsApp and messaging automation. Their platform drives sales and support conversations at scale.

runai.name: Run:ai

orca_security.name: Orca Security
orca_security.description: Orca Security provides agentless cloud security using AI to detect risks. Their SideScanning technology finds vulnerabilities, misconfigurations, and threats without installing software.

wiz.name: Wiz

talon_cyber.name: Talon Cyber Security

verbit.name: Verbit

lightricks.name: Lightricks

viz_ai.name: Viz.ai
viz_ai.description: Viz.ai uses AI to detect strokes and other conditions from medical imaging. Their FDA-cleared platform alerts care teams instantly when AI identifies time-sensitive findings.

aidoc.name: Aidoc

hailo.name: Hailo

snyk.name: Snyk
snyk.description: Snyk uses AI to find and fix security vulnerabilities in code and dependencies. Their developer-first platform scans applications and open source libraries for security issues.

cybereason.name: Cybereason

krutrim.name: Krutrim

sarvam_ai.name: Sarvam AI

fractal_ai.name: Fractal
fractal_ai.description: Fractal provides AI and analytics solutions for Fortune 500 companies. Their expertise spans consumer goods, healthcare, and financial services.

yellow_ai.name: Yellow.ai

uniphore.name: Uniphore

naver_ai.name: Naver AI

kakao_brain.name: Kakao Brain

upstage.name: Upstage

twelve_labs.name: Twelve Labs

scatter_lab.name: Scatter Lab

abeja.name: ABEJA

grab_ai.name: Grab AI
grab_ai.description: Grab's AI division powering Southeast Asia's super app.

sea_ai.name: Sea AI

ema.name: Ema
ema.description: Ema builds AI employees that automate enterprise workflows across HR, finance, and operations. Their universal AI workers integrate with existing systems to handle repetitive tasks.

hebbia.name: Hebbia
hebbia.description: Hebbia provides AI-powered search and analysis for knowledge workers. Their platform helps analysts at financial and legal firms extract insights from massive document sets.

norm_ai.name: Norm AI
norm_ai.description: Norm AI automates regulatory compliance using AI agents. Their technology reads regulations and policies to help enterprises stay compliant with changing requirements.

vanta.name: Vanta
vanta.description: Vanta automates security compliance and monitoring for SOC 2, ISO 27001, and HIPAA. Their platform continuously checks systems and generates evidence for security audits.

cleanlab.name: Cleanlab

unstructured.name: Unstructured

martian.name: Martian

preamble.name: Preamble
preamble.description: Preamble provides AI governance and safety tools for enterprises deploying language models. Their platform helps organizations use AI responsibly with monitoring and guardrails.

livekit.name: LiveKit
livekit.description: LiveKit provides real-time audio and video infrastructure with AI capabilities. Their open-source platform enables developers to build voice AI agents and video applications.

e2b.name: E2B
e2b.description: E2B provides cloud sandboxes for AI agents to execute code safely. Their infrastructure lets AI assistants run code, install packages, and work with files in isolated environments.

vapi.name: Vapi
vapi.description: Vapi provides voice AI infrastructure that makes building phone agents simple. Their platform handles the complexity of real-time voice AI, from speech recognition to natural conversation flow.

retell_ai.name: Retell AI
retell_ai.description: Retell AI enables developers to build human-like voice agents with minimal code. Their platform provides the building blocks for conversational AI that sounds natural and handles complex phone interactions.

bland_ai.name: Bland AI
bland_ai.description: Bland AI creates AI phone agents that conduct human-like conversations at scale. Their technology handles millions of calls for businesses, from appointment scheduling to sales qualification.

vocode.name: Vocode
vocode.description: Vocode is the open-source framework for building voice AI applications. Their modular architecture makes it easy to create voice agents that can make calls, take calls, and have natural conversations.

credal.name: Credal
credal.description: Credal provides secure AI infrastructure for enterprises. Their platform enables safe use of LLMs with data loss prevention, access controls, and audit trails for regulated industries.

context_ai.name: Context.ai
context_ai.description: Context AI provides user analytics for AI products. Their platform tracks how users interact with AI features, measuring satisfaction and helping teams improve AI experiences.

phospho.name: Phospho
phospho.description: Phospho provides text analytics and monitoring for LLM applications. Their platform automatically evaluates AI outputs, detects issues, and surfaces insights from user interactions.

gentrace.name: Gentrace
gentrace.description: Gentrace enables testing and observability for generative AI pipelines. Their platform captures production data, runs evaluations, and helps teams understand how their AI systems perform.

orq_ai.name: Orq.ai
orq_ai.description: Orq.ai is the prompt management platform for enterprise AI. Their tools help teams collaborate on prompts, manage versions, and deploy AI features across applications consistently.

traceloop.name: Traceloop
traceloop.description: Traceloop provides OpenTelemetry-based observability for LLM applications. Their open-source tools capture traces, metrics, and logs from AI systems, integrating with existing observability stacks.

agenta.name: Agenta
agenta.description: Agenta is the open-source LLMOps platform for prompt management and evaluation. Their tools help teams version prompts, run experiments, and deploy AI applications with full observability.

athina_ai.name: Athina AI
athina_ai.description: Athina AI provides automated evaluation and monitoring for AI applications. Their platform detects hallucinations, measures response quality, and alerts teams to AI performance issues in real-time.

baserun.name: Baserun
baserun.description: Baserun provides testing and observability for LLM applications. Their platform enables test-driven development for AI, with tools to catch regressions and ensure reliable model behavior.

wordware.name: Wordware
wordware.description: Wordware is the AI-native IDE for building language AI applications. Their platform enables teams to develop, test, and deploy LLM-powered features with a collaborative, visual interface.

hyperwriteai.name: HyperWrite
hyperwriteai.description: HyperWrite provides AI writing assistance that adapts to your style. Their platform helps writers overcome blocks, generate content, and communicate more effectively across any medium.

multi_on.name: MultiOn
multi_on.description: MultiOn builds AI agents that can browse the web and complete tasks autonomously. Their technology enables AI to interact with websites, fill forms, and accomplish multi-step workflows online.

mindsdb.name: MindsDB
mindsdb.description: MindsDB brings machine learning directly into databases using SQL. Their platform lets developers create, train, and query AI models using familiar SQL syntax, making ML accessible without specialized data science skills.

lightning_ai.name: Lightning AI
lightning_ai.description: Lightning AI builds the PyTorch Lightning framework and Lightning Studios for AI development. Their tools simplify training at any scale, from laptops to multi-node GPU clusters, used by over 10,000 organizations worldwide.

fal_ai.name: fal.ai
fal_ai.description: fal.ai offers lightning-fast inference APIs for generative AI models. Their platform specializes in image and video generation, providing sub-second latency for creative AI applications at massive scale.

fireworks_ai.name: Fireworks AI
fireworks_ai.description: Fireworks AI delivers the fastest inference for open-source language models. Their custom serving stack achieves industry-leading latency and throughput, enabling real-time AI applications that weren't previously possible.

octoai.name: OctoAI
octoai.description: OctoAI provides optimized AI inference infrastructure for deploying models. Their platform makes it easy to run open-source models like Llama and Stable Diffusion at scale.

predibase.name: Predibase
predibase.description: Predibase is the fine-tuning platform built on Ludwig, Uber's declarative ML framework. They make it easy for enterprises to customize language models on their data using efficient techniques like LoRA, without deep ML expertise.

lamini.name: Lamini
lamini.description: Lamini provides enterprise infrastructure for fine-tuning and running custom language models. Their platform enables companies to create specialized AI on proprietary data while keeping that data secure and private.

openpipe.name: OpenPipe
openpipe.description: OpenPipe helps companies reduce AI costs by training smaller, specialized models from their OpenAI API logs. Their platform analyzes your production traffic and creates fine-tuned models that match GPT-4 quality at a fraction of the cost.

conjecture.name: Conjecture
conjecture.description: Conjecture is an AI safety company focused on making language models more predictable and controllable. Their research on interpretability and alignment aims to ensure AI systems remain beneficial as they become more capable.

contextual_ai.name: Contextual AI
contextual_ai.description: Contextual AI is building enterprise RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) systems that ground language models in company knowledge. Founded by Douwe Kiela from Meta AI, they focus on reducing hallucinations and improving factual accuracy in enterprise AI.

voyage_ai.name: Voyage AI
voyage_ai.description: Voyage AI specializes in state-of-the-art embedding models for semantic search and retrieval. Their domain-specific embeddings for legal, code, and finance outperform general-purpose models, enabling more accurate RAG applications.

jina_ai.name: Jina AI
jina_ai.description: Jina AI builds multimodal AI infrastructure including embedding models, rerankers, and search systems. Their open-source neural search framework and embedding APIs power thousands of AI applications worldwide.

nomic_ai.name: Nomic AI
nomic_ai.description: Nomic AI creates open-source tools for understanding and visualizing large datasets and language models. Their Atlas platform and GPT4All project democratize access to AI by enabling local model deployment on consumer hardware.

mixedbread.name: Mixedbread
mixedbread.description: Mixedbread AI develops multilingual embedding models optimized for European languages. Their models excel at cross-lingual retrieval and semantic search, serving enterprises with diverse international content.

dspy.name: DSPy (Databricks)
dspy.description: DSPy is the framework for programming‚Äînot prompting‚Äîlanguage models. Developed at Stanford, it uses optimizers to automatically tune prompts and weights, making LLM applications more reliable and maintainable.

arterys.name: Arterys
arterys.description: Arterys provides AI-powered medical imaging analysis for cardiology and oncology. Their FDA-cleared platform helps radiologists measure heart function and detect liver lesions.

qure_ai.name: Qure.ai
qure_ai.description: Qure.ai uses AI to analyze chest X-rays and head CT scans. Their FDA-cleared technology helps detect tuberculosis, lung nodules, and brain conditions in healthcare settings.

enlitic.name: Enlitic
enlitic.description: Enlitic provides AI for radiology workflow optimization and clinical decision support. Their platform helps healthcare systems standardize imaging data and improve diagnostic accuracy.

lunit.name: Lunit
lunit.description: Lunit develops AI software that detects cancer in medical images. Their FDA-cleared technology analyzes mammograms, chest X-rays, and pathology slides for early detection.

butterfly_network.name: Butterfly Network
butterfly_network.description: Butterfly Network makes handheld ultrasound devices with AI-powered imaging. Their Butterfly iQ probe connects to smartphones, making medical imaging portable and accessible.

atomwise.name: Atomwise
atomwise.description: Atomwise uses AI to predict how molecules will interact with protein targets. Their AtomNet technology has screened billions of compounds for pharmaceutical partners, discovering promising drug candidates.

valo_health.name: Valo Health
valo_health.description: Valo Health integrates human-centric data with AI to transform drug discovery. Their Opal platform combines patient data, AI, and computation to develop drugs with higher probability of success.

owkin.name: Owkin
owkin.description: Owkin uses federated learning to build AI models on sensitive medical data without moving it. Their platform enables collaborative research across hospitals while preserving patient privacy.

bighat_bio.name: BigHat Biosciences
bighat_bio.description: BigHat Biosciences uses AI and machine learning to design antibody therapeutics. Their platform optimizes antibodies for drug properties, creating better treatments for cancer and other diseases.
bighat_bio.founders: Mark DePristo, Bryan Genna, Peyton Greenside

evozyne.name: Evozyne
evozyne.description: Evozyne engineers proteins with AI to create novel biotherapeutics. Their generative models design proteins with enhanced properties for applications in medicine, agriculture, and sustainability.

genesis_therapeutics.name: Genesis Therapeutics
genesis_therapeutics.description: Genesis Therapeutics uses AI to design small molecule drugs targeting difficult proteins. Their GEMS platform models molecular interactions at atomic resolution to find new medicines.

deep_genomics.name: Deep Genomics
deep_genomics.description: Deep Genomics uses AI to develop genetic medicines by understanding how DNA mutations cause disease. Their platform identifies therapeutic targets and designs oligonucleotide drugs to address them.

wysa.name: Wysa
wysa.description: Wysa provides AI-powered mental health support for employees and consumers. Their platform combines self-help tools with access to human coaches, making mental wellness support accessible and affordable.

spring_health.name: Spring Health
spring_health.description: Spring Health provides AI-powered mental health benefits for employers. Their platform matches employees with therapists and recommends personalized treatment approaches.

cerebral.name: Cerebral
cerebral.description: Cerebral offers online mental health treatment with AI-enhanced care matching. Their platform connects patients with prescribers and therapists for depression and anxiety care.

medidata.name: Medidata Solutions
medidata.description: Clinical trial technology platform with AI analytics.

unlearn_ai.name: Unlearn.AI
unlearn_ai.description: Unlearn.AI uses AI to create digital twins for clinical trials. Their technology reduces trial sizes by predicting how control patients would have responded to treatment.

saama.name: Saama Technologies
saama.description: Saama uses AI to accelerate clinical trials and drug development. Their platform analyzes clinical data to optimize studies and speed time to market.

symbotic.name: Symbotic
symbotic.description: Symbotic provides AI-powered warehouse automation with robots that store, retrieve, and move goods autonomously. Their systems help retailers and distributors operate more efficient supply chains.

locus_robotics.name: Locus Robotics
locus_robotics.description: Locus Robotics makes autonomous mobile robots that work alongside humans in warehouses. Their LocusBots have picked billions of items, dramatically improving fulfillment productivity.

berkshire_grey.name: Berkshire Grey
berkshire_grey.description: Berkshire Grey provides AI-powered robotic picking and sorting systems. Their technology automates fulfillment for retail, grocery, and logistics operations.

covariant.name: Covariant

righthand_robotics.name: RightHand Robotics
righthand_robotics.description: RightHand Robotics provides piece-picking robots for e-commerce fulfillment. Their RightPick platform handles the variability of items in warehouses.

fabric.name: Fabric (CommonSense)
fabric.description: Fabric (formerly CommonSense Robotics) operates AI-powered micro-fulfillment centers. Their robotic systems enable retailers to offer fast same-day delivery from urban locations.

ocado_technology.name: Ocado Technology
ocado_technology.description: Advanced robotics and AI for automated grocery fulfillment.
ocado_technology.founders: Tim Steiner, Jonathan Faiman, Jason Gissing

geek_plus.name: Geek+
geek_plus.description: Geek+ is a global leader in autonomous mobile robots for logistics. Their robots move goods in warehouses for major retailers and logistics companies.

hai_robotics.name: HAI Robotics
hai_robotics.description: HAI Robotics provides autonomous case-handling robots for warehouses. Their ACR system retrieves and delivers totes and cases in fulfillment operations.

realtime_robotics.name: Realtime Robotics
realtime_robotics.description: Realtime Robotics provides collision-free motion planning for industrial robots. Their technology enables robots to work safely in dynamic environments.

osaro.name: OSARO
osaro.description: OSARO provides AI-powered robotic picking for logistics and manufacturing. Their vision and machine learning systems enable robots to handle diverse items.

veo_robotics.name: Veo Robotics
veo_robotics.description: Veo Robotics provides 3D safeguarding for industrial robots. Their technology enables humans and robots to work together safely without physical barriers.
veo_robotics.founders: Patrick Sobalvarro, Clara Vu, Scott Denenberg

path_robotics.name: Path Robotics
path_robotics.description: Path Robotics uses AI to automate welding in manufacturing. Their robotic systems learn to weld like skilled tradespeople, addressing labor shortages.

machina_labs.name: Machina Labs
machina_labs.description: Machina Labs uses AI-controlled robots for sheet metal forming. Their technology enables flexible manufacturing of aerospace and automotive parts.

bear_robotics.name: Bear Robotics
bear_robotics.description: Bear Robotics makes AI-powered service robots for restaurants and hospitality. Their Servi robots deliver food to tables, freeing staff for customer engagement.

richtech_robotics.name: Richtech Robotics
richtech_robotics.description: Richtech Robotics builds AI service robots for hospitality and healthcare. Their robots handle delivery, cleaning, and customer service in hotels and facilities.

keenon.name: Keenon Robotics
keenon.description: Keenon Robotics provides service robots for hospitality and healthcare. Their robots deliver food, clean spaces, and assist customers autonomously.

pudu_robotics.name: Pudu Robotics
pudu_robotics.description: Pudu Robotics manufactures commercial service robots used worldwide. Their AI-powered robots deliver food, clean floors, and assist customers in restaurants and hotels.

aigen.name: Aigen
aigen.description: Aigen provides solar-powered farming robots that eliminate weeds without chemicals. Their autonomous rovers enable regenerative agriculture at scale.

verdant_robotics.name: Verdant Robotics
verdant_robotics.description: Verdant Robotics uses AI and robotics for precision agriculture. Their machines identify and treat individual plants, reducing chemical use dramatically.

farmwise.name: FarmWise
farmwise.description: FarmWise builds autonomous robots that remove weeds without chemicals. Their AI-powered machines help farmers practice sustainable agriculture while reducing labor costs.

carbon_robotics.name: Carbon Robotics
carbon_robotics.description: Carbon Robotics uses high-powered lasers to eliminate weeds without chemicals. Their LaserWeeder helps farmers practice sustainable, cost-effective weed control.

abundant_robotics.name: Abundant Robotics
abundant_robotics.description: Abundant Robotics developed robotic apple harvesting technology. Their autonomous harvesters addressed labor challenges in agriculture (company wound down 2021).

built_robotics.name: Built Robotics
built_robotics.description: Built Robotics provides autonomous construction equipment. Their technology enables excavators and dozers to operate autonomously on job sites.

dusty_robotics.name: Dusty Robotics
dusty_robotics.description: Dusty Robotics builds robots that automate construction layout marking. Their FieldPrinter prints building plans directly on floors, reducing errors and speeding construction.

scaled_robotics.name: Scaled Robotics
scaled_robotics.description: Scaled Robotics provides autonomous quality control for construction sites. Their robots scan buildings and compare progress to plans, catching errors before they become costly.

suno.name: Suno
suno.description: Suno creates AI-generated music from text prompts, producing full songs with vocals, instruments, and production. Their technology democratizes music creation, letting anyone compose professional-sounding tracks in any style.
suno.founders: Mikey Shulman, Georg Kucsko, Martin Camacho, Keenan Freyberg

udio.name: Udio
udio.description: Udio creates AI-generated music with unprecedented quality and control. Users can generate full songs with vocals in any style, with fine-grained control over structure and instrumentation.

boomy.name: Boomy
boomy.description: Boomy empowers anyone to create original songs in seconds with AI. Their platform has enabled millions of users to generate and release music across streaming platforms, democratizing music creation.

aiva.name: AIVA
aiva.description: AIVA (Artificial Intelligence Virtual Artist) composes emotional soundtracks using deep learning. Their AI has composed music for films, games, and commercials, recognized as the first AI to be registered with a music rights society.
aiva.founders: Pierre Barreau, Denis Shtefan, Vincent Barreau

amper_music.name: Amper Music (Shutterstock)
amper_music.description: Amper Music (now part of Shutterstock) pioneered AI music composition for content creators. Their technology generates custom royalty-free music that adapts to video content length and mood.
amper_music.founders: Drew Silverstein, Sam Estes, Michael Hobe

endel.name: Endel
endel.description: Endel creates personalized AI soundscapes that adapt to your context and biometrics. Their technology generates ambient audio for focus, sleep, and relaxation, backed by neuroscience research on sound's cognitive effects.
endel.founders: Oleg Stavitsky, Dmitry Evgrafov, Philipp Petrenko

loudly.name: Loudly
loudly.description: Loudly provides AI music generation and recommendation for content creators. Their platform creates custom tracks and helps creators find the perfect music from their extensive library.

splash.name: Splash
splash.description: Splash is an AI music company that makes music creation playful and social. Their technology powers music experiences in games and apps, letting anyone create and perform original songs.

kaedim.name: Kaedim
kaedim.description: Kaedim converts 2D images into 3D models using AI. Their technology helps game developers, architects, and designers quickly create 3D assets from sketches and photos.

meshy.name: Meshy
meshy.description: Meshy provides AI-powered 3D model generation from text or images. Their platform makes 3D content creation accessible to developers and creators without 3D modeling expertise.

spline.name: Spline
spline.description: Spline is a 3D design tool that makes creating 3D web experiences accessible. Their collaborative platform enables designers to build interactive 3D content without traditional 3D software complexity.

masterpiece_studio.name: Masterpiece Studio
masterpiece_studio.description: Masterpiece Studio uses AI to democratize 3D content creation for VR and games. Their tools enable creators to generate, sculpt, and animate 3D models using natural interactions and AI assistance.

charisma.name: Charisma.ai
charisma.description: Charisma.ai provides interactive storytelling with AI characters. Their platform powers branching narratives in games, training simulations, and entertainment experiences.

latitude.name: Latitude (AI Dungeon)
latitude.description: Latitude created AI Dungeon, the text adventure game powered by AI. Their platform generates infinite, unique stories that respond to player choices in real-time.

scenario.name: Scenario
scenario.description: Scenario generates custom AI game assets matching your art style. Game developers use it to create consistent characters, environments, and items without extensive manual artwork.

promethean_ai.name: Promethean AI
promethean_ai.description: Promethean AI automates 3D virtual world creation for games and entertainment. Their AI assists artists in building environments faster with intelligent asset placement.

cala.name: CALA
cala.description: CALA uses AI to streamline fashion design and manufacturing. Their platform helps brands go from design concept to production with AI-powered visualization and sourcing.

fashionphile.name: Fashionphile
fashionphile.description: Fashionphile uses AI to authenticate and price luxury handbags and accessories. Their technology powers the largest luxury resale marketplace with accurate valuations.

zyler.name: Zyler
zyler.description: Zyler provides AI-powered virtual try-on for fashion retailers. Shoppers see how clothes look on them without physically trying items, reducing returns and improving conversion.

vue_ai.name: Vue.ai
vue_ai.description: Vue.ai provides AI-powered retail personalization and visual search. Their technology helps e-commerce brands show customers relevant products based on style preferences.

codium_ai.name: CodiumAI (Qodo)
codium_ai.description: Qodo (formerly CodiumAI) uses AI to generate meaningful tests and improve code quality. Their tools analyze code semantics to create comprehensive test suites that catch bugs early.

diffblue.name: Diffblue
diffblue.description: Diffblue automatically writes unit tests for Java code using AI. Their Cover tool generates tests that improve coverage and catch regressions, saving developers hours of manual work.

applitools.name: Applitools
applitools.description: Applitools provides AI-powered visual testing for web and mobile applications. Their Visual AI catches UI bugs that functional tests miss, ensuring pixel-perfect experiences.
applitools.founders: Gil Sever, Adam Carmi, Moshe Milman

testim.name: Testim (Tricentis)
testim.description: Testim uses AI to create and maintain automated tests that are stable and fast. Their platform reduces test flakiness and maintenance burden for QA teams.

functionize.name: Functionize
functionize.description: Functionize provides AI-powered test automation that creates tests from natural language. Their platform uses machine learning to build and maintain tests without coding.

mabl.name: Mabl
mabl.description: Mabl is the intelligent test automation platform that uses AI to create, execute, and maintain tests. Their low-code approach enables teams to ship quality software faster.

mintlify.name: Mintlify
mintlify.description: Mintlify creates beautiful documentation from code using AI. Their platform generates and maintains API docs, guides, and references that stay synchronized with your codebase, eliminating documentation drift.

readme.name: ReadMe
readme.description: ReadMe provides interactive API documentation that helps developers succeed. Their platform creates beautiful docs from OpenAPI specs with AI-powered search and analytics on how developers use your APIs.

swimm.name: Swimm
swimm.description: Swimm creates living documentation that stays coupled to your code. Their platform uses AI to generate and update internal docs, ensuring knowledge stays accurate as code evolves.
swimm.founders: Omer Rosenbaum, Tom Ahi Dror, Gilad Navot

stenography.name: Stenography
stenography.description: Stenography automatically documents code using AI that understands programming languages. Their tool generates clear explanations for functions and classes, making codebases more maintainable and accessible.

codacy.name: Codacy
codacy.description: Codacy automates code quality and security checks across your repositories. Their platform combines static analysis with AI to identify bugs, vulnerabilities, and maintainability issues before they reach production.

codeclimate.name: Code Climate
codeclimate.description: Code Climate provides automated code review for technical debt and test coverage. Their platform helps engineering teams maintain code quality at scale with actionable metrics and team velocity insights.

bito.name: Bito
bito.description: Bito brings AI assistance to your IDE and CLI with enterprise-grade security. Their platform enables developers to use AI for code generation, explanation, and review while keeping code private.

codiga.name: Codiga
codiga.description: Codiga provides real-time code analysis and automated code reviews. Their AI identifies bugs, security issues, and code quality problems as developers write code.

coderabbit.name: CodeRabbit
coderabbit.description: CodeRabbit provides AI-powered code reviews that catch bugs and suggest improvements. Their GitHub integration analyzes every pull request, providing detailed feedback that improves over time based on your team's patterns.

stepsize.name: Stepsize
stepsize.description: Stepsize helps engineering teams track and manage technical debt. Their platform integrates with your IDE and issue tracker to surface, prioritize, and address code quality issues systematically.

fig.name: Fig (Amazon)
fig.description: Fig (acquired by AWS) transformed the terminal with AI-powered autocomplete. Their technology brought IDE-like intelligence to the command line, making CLI tools more discoverable and easier to use.
fig.founders: Matt Schrage, Sean Zhou, Grant Slatton

warp.name: Warp
warp.description: Warp is the AI-powered terminal that makes the command line accessible. Their GPU-accelerated terminal includes AI command search, collaborative features, and modern editing that brings the CLI into the 21st century.

codewhisperer.name: Amazon CodeWhisperer (Q)
codewhisperer.description: Amazon's AI coding companion integrated with AWS.

alpaca.name: Alpaca
alpaca.description: Alpaca provides commission-free stock trading APIs for developers. Their platform enables fintechs and apps to embed stock trading with simple API calls, democratizing access to financial markets.

kavout.name: Kavout
kavout.description: Kavout applies AI to stock analysis and quantitative trading strategies. Their platform helps investors identify opportunities using machine learning on financial data.

arta_finance.name: Arta Finance
arta_finance.description: Arta Finance provides AI-powered wealth management for accredited investors. Their platform offers access to alternative investments and personalized portfolio strategies.

composer.name: Composer
composer.description: Composer enables anyone to build and automate investing strategies without code. Their platform makes systematic investing accessible, with AI that helps create and optimize trading strategies.

toggle_ai.name: Toggle AI
toggle_ai.description: Toggle AI provides investment intelligence powered by machine learning. Their platform analyzes financial markets to help investors make data-driven decisions.

boosted_ai.name: Boosted.ai
boosted_ai.description: Boosted.ai uses machine learning to help portfolio managers make better investment decisions. Their platform analyzes data to identify opportunities and risks in financial markets.

numerai.name: Numerai
numerai.description: Numerai is the AI-run hedge fund built on a global network of data scientists. Their tournament structure pays data scientists for predictive stock market models, crowdsourcing alpha from thousands of participants.

upstart.name: Upstart
upstart.description: Upstart uses AI to improve lending decisions beyond traditional credit scores. Their platform helps banks approve more borrowers by analyzing education and employment data.
upstart.founders: Dave Girouard, Anna Counselman, Paul Gu

zest_ai.name: Zest AI
zest_ai.description: Zest AI provides machine learning software for credit underwriting. Their platform helps lenders make fairer, more accurate loan decisions while reducing risk and bias.

pagaya.name: Pagaya
pagaya.description: Pagaya uses AI to expand credit access by better understanding risk. Their technology helps lenders approve more borrowers safely, using machine learning to evaluate creditworthiness beyond traditional scores.
pagaya.founders: Gal Krubiner, Avital Pardo, Yahav Yulzari

ocrolus.name: Ocrolus
ocrolus.description: Ocrolus automates document processing for lenders with AI. Their platform extracts and analyzes financial documents, enabling faster and more accurate lending decisions.

lemonade.name: Lemonade
lemonade.description: Lemonade uses AI to reinvent insurance from the ground up. Their platform handles quotes, claims, and customer service with chatbots, creating a delightful experience that traditional insurers can't match.

shift_technology.name: Shift Technology
shift_technology.description: Shift Technology detects insurance fraud with AI across all lines. Their platform analyzes claims in real-time, helping insurers identify fraud while improving the experience for legitimate customers.
shift_technology.founders: Eric Sibony, David Durrleman, Jeremy Jawish

cape_analytics.name: Cape Analytics
cape_analytics.description: Cape Analytics uses AI and geospatial imagery to assess property risk instantly. Their platform helps insurers underwrite more accurately by analyzing roof condition, tree coverage, and other factors from aerial imagery.

akur8.name: Akur8
akur8.description: Akur8 brings transparent AI to insurance pricing. Their platform enables actuaries to build and explain sophisticated pricing models, combining machine learning power with regulatory transparency.

gauntlet.name: Gauntlet
gauntlet.description: Gauntlet provides economic security and risk management for DeFi protocols. Their platform models and optimizes the economic parameters of decentralized finance, preventing exploits and improving capital efficiency.

elliptic.name: Elliptic
elliptic.description: Elliptic provides blockchain analytics for compliance and investigation. Their platform traces cryptocurrency transactions, helping financial institutions and government agencies combat financial crime.
elliptic.founders: James Smith, Tom Robinson, Adam Joyce

chainalysis.name: Chainalysis
chainalysis.description: Chainalysis is the blockchain data platform for government and business. Their investigation and compliance tools have become essential infrastructure for cryptocurrency's integration with traditional finance.

merkle_science.name: Merkle Science
merkle_science.description: Merkle Science provides predictive blockchain intelligence for risk detection. Their platform helps financial institutions and crypto businesses identify suspicious activity before it becomes a problem.

exabeam.name: Exabeam
exabeam.description: Exabeam provides AI-driven security operations for threat detection and response. Their platform uses behavioral analytics to identify compromised users and insider threats that other tools miss.

securonix.name: Securonix
securonix.description: Securonix provides next-gen SIEM with user and entity behavior analytics. Their platform uses machine learning to detect threats that evade traditional security tools, from insider threats to advanced attacks.

hunters.name: Hunters
hunters.description: Hunters provides autonomous threat hunting powered by AI. Their SOC platform investigates alerts automatically, turning weeks of analyst work into minutes of machine analysis.

anvilogic.name: Anvilogic
anvilogic.description: Anvilogic modernizes security operations with AI-enhanced threat detection. Their platform helps security teams detect and respond to threats faster by augmenting human analysts with machine intelligence.

intezer.name: Intezer
intezer.description: Intezer uses genetic malware analysis to detect and classify cyber threats. Their AI identifies code similarities to known malware, automating threat investigation.

forgerock.name: ForgeRock
forgerock.description: ForgeRock provides AI-enhanced identity and access management for enterprises. Their platform secures digital identities with intelligent authentication and authorization.

transmit_security.name: Transmit Security
transmit_security.description: Transmit Security provides passwordless authentication with AI-powered fraud detection. Their platform eliminates passwords while using behavioral analysis to prevent account takeover.

beyond_identity.name: Beyond Identity
beyond_identity.description: Beyond Identity eliminates passwords with phishing-resistant authentication. Their platform uses device-bound credentials and AI to verify identity without shared secrets.

descope.name: Descope
descope.description: Descope provides drag-and-drop authentication with AI-enhanced security. Their platform makes it easy for developers to add secure login flows with fraud prevention built-in.

contrast_security.name: Contrast Security
contrast_security.description: Contrast Security provides application security testing with AI-powered analysis. Their platform finds vulnerabilities in code and protects running applications from attacks.

apiiro.name: Apiiro
apiiro.description: Apiiro provides risk visibility across the software development lifecycle. Their platform analyzes code changes to identify security risks before they reach production, shifting security left in development.

semgrep.name: Semgrep
semgrep.description: Semgrep provides code security analysis that developers actually use. Their fast, pattern-based static analysis catches bugs and vulnerabilities during development, integrating seamlessly into workflows.
semgrep.founders: Isaac Evans, Drew Dennison, Luke O'Malley

endor_labs.name: Endor Labs
endor_labs.description: Endor Labs secures the open source software supply chain. Their platform helps organizations understand and manage the risk of open source dependencies in their applications.

ox_security.name: OX Security
ox_security.description: Ox Security provides end-to-end software supply chain security. Their platform protects the entire CI/CD pipeline from code to cloud, preventing attacks that target the build process.

cyera.name: Cyera
cyera.description: Cyera provides AI-powered data security posture management. Their platform discovers and classifies sensitive data across cloud environments, enabling security teams to protect what matters most.

normalyze.name: Normalyze
normalyze.description: Normalyze provides agentless data security for cloud environments. Their platform continuously discovers sensitive data and identifies risks without deploying agents, enabling comprehensive data protection.

polar_security.name: Polar Security
polar_security.description: Polar Security discovers and protects sensitive data across cloud environments. Their AI automatically maps data flows and identifies security risks in cloud-native applications.

spellbook.name: Spellbook (Rally)
spellbook.description: Spellbook is the AI contract drafting assistant that helps lawyers work faster. Integrated with Microsoft Word, it suggests language and reviews contracts using legal AI.
spellbook.founders: Scott Stevenson, Matteo Morreale, Dan Scholnick

robin_ai.name: Robin AI
robin_ai.description: Robin AI drafts, reviews, and negotiates contracts using artificial intelligence. Their platform handles routine legal work, enabling legal teams to focus on strategic matters while reducing contract turnaround time.

evisort.name: Evisort
evisort.description: Evisort provides AI-powered contract intelligence that transforms how businesses manage agreements. Their platform extracts insights from contracts, automates workflows, and reduces legal risk.
evisort.founders: Jerry Ting, Amine Matrimboli, Jake Sussman

ironclad.name: Ironclad
ironclad.description: Ironclad is the leading digital contracting platform for legal teams. Their AI streamlines contract creation, negotiation, and management for enterprises worldwide.

juro.name: Juro
juro.description: Juro is the AI-native contract management platform that enables teams to create, execute, and manage contracts collaboratively. Their browser-based solution makes legal workflows accessible to everyone.

casemine.name: CaseMine
casemine.description: Casemine is the legal research platform powered by AI that helps lawyers find relevant case law faster. Their technology understands legal concepts, improving research efficiency for legal professionals.

coursera_ai.name: Coursera
coursera_ai.description: Coursera brings AI to global education with AI-powered course tools and content. Their platform helps millions learn new skills with personalized recommendations and AI-enhanced learning experiences.

duolingo.name: Duolingo
duolingo.description: Duolingo is the world's most popular language learning app, now powered by AI. Their adaptive lessons and new AI tutoring features help millions learn languages through gamified, personalized practice.

khan_academy.name: Khan Academy (Khanmigo)
khan_academy.description: Khan Academy's Khanmigo is an AI tutor that helps students learn. Powered by GPT-4, it guides learners through problems, answers questions, and personalizes education.

squirrel_ai.name: Squirrel AI
squirrel_ai.description: Squirrel AI provides adaptive learning technology for K-12 students in China. Their AI personalizes education, identifying knowledge gaps and optimizing learning paths.

century_tech.name: Century Tech
century_tech.description: Century Tech provides AI-powered personalized learning for schools. Their platform adapts to each student's knowledge gaps, creating individualized pathways that improve outcomes.

quizlet.name: Quizlet
quizlet.description: Quizlet helps students master any subject with AI-powered flashcards and study tools. Their adaptive learning algorithms personalize practice for hundreds of millions of learners.

photomath.name: Photomath
photomath.description: Photomath solves math problems from photos with step-by-step explanations. Their AI helps millions of students understand math concepts by showing how to arrive at solutions.

chegg.name: Chegg
chegg.description: Chegg provides AI-powered learning support for students. Their platform offers homework help, writing assistance, and tutoring, using AI to explain concepts and guide learning.

zillow_ai.name: Zillow AI
zillow_ai.description: AI-powered Zestimate home valuations and recommendations.

redfin_ai.name: Redfin AI
redfin_ai.description: AI-powered real estate recommendations and pricing.

beamery.name: Beamery
beamery.description: Beamery is the talent lifecycle management platform that transforms how companies attract and retain talent. Their AI helps organizations build talent pipelines and internal mobility programs.

paradox_ai.name: Paradox (Olivia)
paradox_ai.description: Paradox provides Olivia, the conversational AI assistant for recruiting. Their platform automates screening, scheduling, and candidate communication, transforming the hiring experience.

hirevue.name: HireVue
hirevue.description: HireVue provides AI-powered video interviewing and assessments for hiring. Their platform helps employers evaluate candidates at scale with structured interviews and game-based tests.

pymetrics.name: Pymetrics (Harver)
pymetrics.description: Pymetrics (now Harver) uses neuroscience-based games and AI to match candidates to jobs. Their platform predicts job success while reducing bias in hiring decisions.

textio.name: Textio
textio.description: Textio uses AI to improve writing in recruiting and business communications. Their platform suggests edits to job postings and emails to attract diverse candidates.

seekout.name: SeekOut
seekout.description: SeekOut provides AI-powered talent search that helps recruiters find and engage diverse candidates. Their platform searches public data and internal databases to surface hidden talent.

phenom.name: Phenom
phenom.description: Phenom provides the intelligent talent experience platform for enterprises. Their AI personalizes every interaction across recruiting, internal mobility, and career development.
phenom.founders: Mahe Bayireddi, Brad Goldoor, Hari Bayireddi

flexport.name: Flexport
flexport.description: Flexport uses AI to optimize global trade and logistics. Their platform provides visibility and automation across supply chains, helping businesses move goods more efficiently.

project44.name: project44
project44.description: project44 provides supply chain visibility powered by AI. Their platform tracks shipments in real-time, predicting delays and enabling proactive logistics management.

fourkites.name: FourKites
fourkites.description: FourKites delivers real-time supply chain visibility with AI-powered predictions. Their platform helps shippers and carriers optimize logistics with accurate ETAs and exception management.

coupa.name: Coupa
coupa.description: Coupa uses AI to optimize business spending across procurement and supply chain. Their platform helps enterprises manage costs, mitigate risks, and drive efficiency.

llamasoft.name: Coupa Supply Chain (LLamasoft)
llamasoft.description: AI supply chain design and planning.

o9_solutions.name: o9 Solutions
o9_solutions.description: o9 Solutions provides AI-powered planning for supply chain and commercial operations. Their platform enables enterprises to make better decisions faster with integrated planning.

kinaxis.name: Kinaxis
kinaxis.description: Kinaxis provides AI-powered supply chain planning and management. Their RapidResponse platform helps enterprises handle disruptions and optimize inventory with real-time insights.

pachama.name: Pachama
pachama.description: Pachama uses AI and satellite data to verify forest carbon credits. Their technology ensures carbon offsets actually remove CO2, bringing transparency and trust to carbon markets.

watershed.name: Watershed
watershed.description: Watershed helps companies measure and reduce their carbon footprint with AI-powered climate software. Their platform makes corporate sustainability actionable with automated data collection and reporting.
watershed.founders: Christian Anderson, Avi Itskovich, Taylor Francis

persefoni.name: Persefoni
persefoni.description: Persefoni provides AI-powered carbon accounting for enterprises and financial institutions. Their platform automates emissions measurement and reporting for climate disclosure requirements.

carbonfact.name: Carbonfact
carbonfact.description: Carbonfact uses AI to measure carbon footprints for fashion brands. Their platform analyzes supply chains to help apparel companies track and reduce environmental impact.

climavision.name: Climavision
climavision.description: Climavision provides AI-enhanced weather forecasting and climate intelligence. Their proprietary radar network and models deliver hyperlocal predictions for agriculture and logistics.

tomorrow_io.name: Tomorrow.io
tomorrow_io.description: Tomorrow.io provides AI-powered weather intelligence for enterprises. Their platform delivers hyperlocal forecasts and climate insights for supply chain and operations planning.
tomorrow_io.founders: Shimon Elkabetz, Rei Goffer, Itai Zlotnik

intel_ai.name: Intel AI
intel_ai.description: Intel's AI division including Xeon processors, Gaudi accelerators, and neural network solutions.

huawei_ascend.name: Huawei Ascend
huawei_ascend.description: Huawei's AI chip series competing with NVIDIA in China.

google_tpu.name: Google TPU
google_tpu.description: Google's custom Tensor Processing Units for AI workloads.

aws_inferentia.name: AWS Inferentia/Trainium
aws_inferentia.description: Amazon's custom AI chips for inference and training.

apple_neural.name: Apple Neural Engine
apple_neural.description: Apple's dedicated AI/ML hardware in iPhones, iPads, and Macs.

salesforce_einstein.name: Salesforce Einstein
salesforce_einstein.description: Salesforce Einstein brings AI to the world's leading CRM. It predicts customer behavior, automates workflows, and personalizes experiences across sales and service.

google_duet.name: Google Duet AI
google_duet.description: Google's AI assistant for Workspace (Docs, Sheets, Gmail).

zoom_ai.name: Zoom AI Companion
zoom_ai.description: Zoom's AI assistant for meetings, summaries, and chat.

slack_ai.name: Slack AI
slack_ai.description: AI-powered search, summaries, and automation in Slack.

bing_search.name: Microsoft Bing
bing_search.description: Microsoft's search engine with integrated AI chat.

duckduckgo.name: DuckDuckGo
duckduckgo.description: DuckDuckGo is a privacy-focused search engine using AI for instant answers. Their AI features summarize results and answer questions while protecting user data.

brave_search.name: Brave Search
brave_search.description: Independent search engine with AI summaries.

baidu_search.name: Baidu Search
baidu_search.description: China's dominant search engine with AI integration.

yandex_search.name: Yandex Search
yandex_search.description: Russia's leading search engine with AI features.

neeva.name: Neeva (Snowflake)
neeva.description: Neeva was an ad-free AI-powered search engine acquired by Snowflake. Their technology now powers enterprise AI search and retrieval within Snowflake's data platform.

gen3_runway.name: Runway Gen-3
gen3_runway.description: Runway Gen-3 Alpha is the latest text-to-video model offering unprecedented control and quality. Its generation capabilities continue pushing the boundaries of AI video.

minimax_video.name: MiniMax Video
minimax_video.description: Chinese video generation competing with Sora.

genmo.name: Genmo
genmo.description: Genmo builds AI tools for creating and editing video content. Their platform combines generative AI with intuitive editing capabilities, making video production faster and more accessible for creators.

kaiber.name: Kaiber
kaiber.description: Kaiber AI transforms images and videos into stunning AI-generated animations. Their unique aesthetic and style transfer capabilities have made them popular among music video creators and visual artists.

morph_studio.name: Morph Studio
morph_studio.description: Morph Studio provides AI video generation with cinematic quality and precise control. Their platform enables creators to generate, edit, and composite AI video with professional-grade tools and workflows.

flux.name: Flux (Black Forest Labs)

imagen.name: Google Imagen
imagen.description: Google Imagen is DeepMind's text-to-image model known for photorealism and text rendering. Its diffusion-based approach achieves remarkable image quality and prompt following.

getimg.name: Getimg.ai
getimg.description: GetImg.ai provides a comprehensive AI image generation platform with multiple models and tools. Their suite includes text-to-image, inpainting, outpainting, and model training capabilities for creators and developers.

playground_ai.name: Playground
playground_ai.description: Playground AI is a free creative platform for AI image generation with an intuitive interface. Their community-focused approach lets millions of users create, share, and remix AI-generated art with powerful editing tools.

clipdrop.name: Clipdrop (Stability)
clipdrop.description: AI image editing tools by Stability AI.

amazon_polly.name: Amazon Polly
amazon_polly.description: Amazon Polly converts text to lifelike speech using deep learning. Its neural voices enable applications from accessibility features to customer service automation.

wellsaid.name: WellSaid Labs
wellsaid.description: WellSaid Labs creates AI voices indistinguishable from human recordings. Their studio-quality voice avatars enable media companies and enterprises to produce voiceovers at scale without recording sessions.

lovo.name: LOVO
lovo.description: LOVO AI provides hyper-realistic text-to-speech and voice cloning for content creators. Their platform offers hundreds of AI voices and enables anyone to create their own custom voice model.

coqui.name: Coqui
coqui.description: Coqui builds open-source text-to-speech technology that rivals proprietary solutions. Their XTTS model enables voice cloning and multilingual synthesis, democratizing access to advanced voice AI.
coqui.founders: Josh Meyer, Eren G√∂lge, Kelly Davis

c3ai.name: C3.ai
c3ai.description: C3.ai provides enterprise AI software for industry-specific applications. Their platform enables predictive maintenance, fraud detection, and supply chain optimization at scale.

dataiku.name: Dataiku
dataiku.description: Dataiku provides an enterprise AI platform for building and deploying machine learning. Their collaborative environment helps data teams create AI applications with visual tools and code.
dataiku.founders: Florian Douetteau, Marc Batty, Thomas Cabrol, Cl√©ment Stenac

alteryx.name: Alteryx
alteryx.description: Alteryx empowers data analysts with AI-powered automation. Their platform enables self-service analytics, blending data and running advanced analyses without coding.
alteryx.founders: Dean Stoecker, Olivia Duane Adams, Ned Harding

sas_institute.name: SAS Institute
sas_institute.description: SAS Institute provides advanced analytics and AI software for enterprises. Their platform helps organizations analyze data, build models, and make decisions with statistical intelligence.

bmc_software.name: BMC Software
bmc_software.description: BMC Software provides AI-powered IT management and automation solutions. Their platform helps enterprises automate IT operations, service management, and mainframe optimization.
bmc_software.founders: Scott Boulette, John Moores, Dan Cloer

ivanti.name: Ivanti
ivanti.description: Ivanti provides AI-enhanced IT asset and service management. Their platform uses machine learning to automate IT operations, security patching, and device management.

freshworks_ent.name: Freshworks
freshworks_ent.description: Freshworks provides AI-powered customer service and IT support software. Their Freddy AI automates ticket resolution, suggests responses, and helps agents work more efficiently.

cloudera_ent.name: Cloudera
cloudera_ent.description: Cloudera provides an enterprise data platform with AI and machine learning capabilities. Their hybrid cloud solution helps organizations manage big data and build AI applications.

dremio.name: Dremio
dremio.description: Dremio provides the lakehouse platform that makes data accessible without copying. Their query engine enables fast, self-service analytics directly on cloud data lakes.

starburst.name: Starburst
starburst.description: Starburst provides the analytics engine for distributed data. Built on Trino, their platform enables queries across data lakes, warehouses, and databases without data movement.
starburst.founders: Justin Borgman, Kamil Bajda-Pawlikowski, Martin Traverso, Dain Sundstrom

clickhouse_inc.name: ClickHouse Inc
clickhouse_inc.description: ClickHouse provides a real-time analytics database with AI-optimized performance. Their open-source OLAP system handles billions of rows for data pipelines and AI applications.

bae_systems.name: BAE Systems
bae_systems.description: BAE Systems is the global defense contractor advancing AI for military applications. Their AI work spans autonomous systems, electronic warfare, and intelligence analysis for armed forces.

raytheon.name: RTX (Raytheon)
raytheon.description: Raytheon (RTX) develops AI for defense systems from missiles to radar. Their machine learning capabilities enhance threat detection, autonomous navigation, and decision support for military operations.

leidos.name: Leidos
leidos.description: Leidos provides AI solutions for national security and civil agencies. Their work spans health IT, defense systems, and intelligence analysis, with AI augmenting capabilities across missions.

booz_allen.name: Booz Allen Hamilton
booz_allen.description: Booz Allen Hamilton provides AI consulting and solutions for government and defense. Their teams build AI systems for national security, intelligence, and digital transformation.

saic.name: SAIC
saic.description: SAIC delivers AI-powered solutions for defense, space, and federal agencies. Their technology supports missions from intelligence analysis to space exploration with advanced AI capabilities.

elbit_systems.name: Elbit Systems
elbit_systems.description: Elbit Systems develops AI for defense applications including autonomous vehicles, surveillance, and electronic warfare. Their AI capabilities serve armed forces worldwide.

rafael.name: Rafael Advanced Defense
rafael.description: Rafael develops AI-enhanced defense systems for Israel and allied nations. Their Iron Dome and Trophy systems use AI for threat detection and autonomous defense.

fetch_robotics.name: Fetch Robotics (Zebra)
fetch_robotics.description: Fetch Robotics (now Zebra) builds autonomous mobile robots for warehouses. Their AI-powered robots transport materials and perform inventory tasks alongside human workers.

autostore.name: AutoStore
autostore.description: AutoStore provides cube-based robotic storage and retrieval systems. Their technology maximizes warehouse density with robots operating on a grid above stored goods.

argo_ai.name: Argo AI (Shutdown)
argo_ai.description: Argo AI was an autonomous vehicle company backed by Ford and Volkswagen. They developed self-driving technology before shutting down in 2022 due to industry challenges.

aptiv.name: Aptiv
aptiv.description: Aptiv provides advanced safety and autonomous driving technology to automakers. Their hardware and software enable ADAS features and serve as building blocks for vehicle autonomy.

luminar.name: Luminar Technologies
luminar.description: Luminar develops lidar sensors essential for autonomous vehicles. Their long-range, high-resolution sensors help vehicles see and understand their surroundings safely.

velodyne.name: Velodyne Lidar (Ouster)
velodyne.description: Velodyne (now Ouster) pioneered lidar for autonomous vehicles and robotics. Their sensors provide 3D perception that enables safe navigation in complex environments.

ouster.name: Ouster
ouster.description: Ouster provides digital lidar sensors for autonomous vehicles, robotics, and smart infrastructure. Their solid-state technology delivers reliable 3D perception at competitive cost.

innoviz.name: Innoviz Technologies
innoviz.description: Innoviz develops solid-state lidar for automotive mass production. Their sensors enable vehicle autonomy with the reliability and cost structure automakers require.

valeo.name: Valeo
valeo.description: Valeo is the automotive supplier bringing AI to vehicles through ADAS and lidar. Their sensors and software enable the autonomous features becoming standard in modern cars.

continental_auto.name: Continental Automotive
continental_auto.description: German auto supplier with autonomous tech.

atom_computing.name: Atom Computing
atom_computing.description: Atom Computing builds neutral atom quantum computers for practical applications. Their approach uses optical tweezers to trap atoms, enabling scalable quantum processing.

pasqal.name: Pasqal
pasqal.description: Pasqal develops neutral atom quantum processors for optimization and simulation. Their technology addresses real-world problems in chemistry, logistics, and machine learning.

alice_bob.name: Alice & Bob
alice_bob.description: Alice & Bob is building fault-tolerant quantum computers using cat qubits. Their approach promises inherent error resistance, potentially achieving useful quantum computing with fewer physical qubits.

quera.name: QuEra Computing
quera.description: QuEra Computing develops neutral atom quantum computers for scientific and commercial use. Their approach enables programmable quantum processors for optimization and simulation.

zscaler.name: Zscaler
zscaler.description: Zscaler provides cloud security with AI-powered threat detection. Their zero trust platform protects enterprises as work moves to the cloud, analyzing traffic for threats in real-time.

fortinet.name: Fortinet
fortinet.description: Fortinet provides AI-powered cybersecurity for enterprises. Their FortiGuard AI analyzes threats in real-time, protecting networks, endpoints, and cloud environments from sophisticated attacks.

cloudflare.name: Cloudflare
cloudflare.description: Cloudflare uses AI to protect and accelerate websites and applications. Their network serves millions of sites, using machine learning to block attacks and optimize delivery.
cloudflare.founders: Matthew Prince, Michelle Zatlyn, Lee Holloway

checkpoint.name: Check Point Software
checkpoint.description: Check Point protects enterprises with AI-powered security across networks, cloud, and mobile. Their ThreatCloud AI blocks millions of attacks daily using shared threat intelligence.
checkpoint.founders: Gil Shwed, Marius Nacht, Shlomo Kramer

oracle_cloud.name: Oracle Cloud AI
oracle_cloud.description: Oracle's cloud AI services and infrastructure.

autodesk_ai.name: Autodesk AI
autodesk_ai.description: Autodesk's AI-powered design and engineering tools.

siemens_ai.name: Siemens Industrial AI
siemens_ai.description: Siemens' AI for industrial automation and digital twins.

unity_ai.name: Unity AI
unity_ai.description: Unity's AI tools for game development and simulation.
unity_ai.founders: Unity (David Helgason, Joachim Ante, Nicholas Francis)

unreal_engine.name: Unreal Engine (Epic)
unreal_engine.description: Epic's game engine with AI-powered features.

apple_music.name: Apple Music
apple_music.description: Apple's music streaming with AI recommendations.

youtube_music.name: YouTube Music
youtube_music.description: Google's music service with AI-powered discovery.

amazon_music.name: Amazon Music
amazon_music.description: Amazon's music streaming with Alexa integration.

bloomberg_law.name: Bloomberg Law
bloomberg_law.description: Legal research platform with AI analytics.

hubspot_ai.name: HubSpot AI
hubspot_ai.description: HubSpot's AI-powered CRM and marketing tools.

atlassian_ai.name: Atlassian Intelligence
atlassian_ai.description: AI features across Jira, Confluence, and Trello.

boeing_ai.name: Boeing Autonomous
boeing_ai.description: Boeing's autonomous systems and AI for defense.

general_dynamics.name: General Dynamics
general_dynamics.description: General Dynamics applies AI across defense platforms from ships to IT systems. Their AI work enhances military capabilities in combat vehicles, communication systems, and cybersecurity.

leonardo_defense.name: Leonardo S.p.A.
leonardo_defense.description: Leonardo develops AI for aerospace, defense, and security. Their technologies span autonomous systems, command and control, and surveillance for military and civil applications.

mediatek.name: MediaTek
mediatek.description: MediaTek is the semiconductor company bringing AI to billions of devices. Their AI processing units enable on-device intelligence in smartphones, IoT, and automotive applications worldwide.

sap_ai.name: SAP AI
sap_ai.description: SAP's AI features across enterprise software.

visme.name: Visme
visme.description: Visme is the all-in-one visual content platform for businesses. Their tools for presentations, infographics, and interactive content help non-designers create professional visuals with AI assistance.

piktochart.name: Piktochart
piktochart.description: Piktochart makes visual storytelling accessible with AI-powered design tools. Their platform helps millions of users create infographics, presentations, and reports without graphic design skills.

tidal_music.name: TIDAL
tidal_music.description: High-fidelity music streaming with AI features.

01_ai.name: 01.AI (Yi)
01_ai.description: Chinese AI startup founded by Kai-Fu Lee, building open-source and commercial LLMs.

nous_research.name: Nous Research
nous_research.description: Nous Research is a grassroots AI research collective that fine-tunes and improves open-source language models. Their Hermes, Capybara, and other model variants have become favorites in the open-source community for their quality and instruction-following.

adept_ai.name: Adept AI
adept_ai.description: Adept AI builds AI agents that can use software like humans do. Their technology enables AI to take actions in web browsers and enterprise applications autonomously.
adept_ai.founders: David Luan, Ashish Vaswani (Transformer co-creator), Niki Parmar

inflection_ai.name: Inflection AI
inflection_ai.description: AI company behind Pi, a personal AI assistant. Most of team acquired by Microsoft in 2024.
