inflection_ai.funding: $1.5B+ total. Team largely acquired by Microsoft 2024

etalon_ai.name: Etalon AI
etalon_ai.description: Etalon AI provides precision measurement technology using AI for manufacturing quality control. Their systems help factories achieve tighter tolerances in production processes.

cognosys.name: Cognosys
cognosys.description: Cognosys creates AI agents that automate web-based research and tasks. Their platform enables users to delegate complex information gathering and analysis to AI that browses and extracts insights.

lindy_ai.name: Lindy AI
lindy_ai.description: Lindy is an AI assistant that automates complex workflows by connecting to your apps and learning your processes. It handles tasks from meeting scheduling to research and data analysis.

relevance_ai.name: Relevance AI
relevance_ai.description: Relevance AI provides the platform for building AI agents that understand your business. Their tools enable teams to create custom agents that work with your data and systems.

gumloop.name: Gumloop
gumloop.description: Gumloop is the no-code platform for building AI automation pipelines. Their visual builder enables teams to create sophisticated AI workflows by connecting models, data sources, and actions.

agent_ai.name: Agent.ai
agent_ai.description: Agent.ai provides autonomous AI agents for business process automation. Their platform enables enterprises to deploy AI workers that handle tasks across systems without constant human guidance.

superagent.name: Superagent
superagent.description: Superagent is the open-source framework for building AI assistants. Their platform enables developers to create agents that can use tools, access data, and accomplish tasks autonomously.

beam_ai.name: Beam AI
beam_ai.description: Beam AI provides agentic process automation for enterprises. Their platform enables AI agents to execute business processes end-to-end, learning from human workflows to handle exceptions.

mesa.name: Mesa
mesa.description: Mesa provides AI agents for revenue operations. Their platform automates sales processes, from data enrichment to outreach sequencing, enabling teams to focus on closing deals.

aomni.name: Aomni
aomni.description: Aomni is the AI research agent for sales teams. Their platform automatically researches accounts, identifies opportunities, and generates insights that help reps personalize outreach.

hedra.name: Hedra
hedra.description: Hedra creates AI-powered video generation with a focus on character animation. Their technology brings static images to life with realistic motion and expressions, enabling new forms of animated content creation.

rodin.name: Rodin (Deemos)
rodin.description: Rodin (Hyperhuman) creates photorealistic 3D human avatars using AI. Their technology generates detailed digital humans from photos or text, enabling new applications in gaming, virtual worlds, and digital fashion.

tripo_ai.name: Tripo AI
tripo_ai.description: Tripo AI generates 3D models from text and images using advanced AI. Their technology creates detailed, usable 3D assets in seconds, democratizing 3D content creation for games, AR, and design.

csm_ai.name: CSM (Common Sense Machines)
csm_ai.description: CSM (Common Sense Machines) builds AI that understands the 3D world. Their technology generates 3D content and enables AI systems to reason about spatial relationships, bridging 2D and 3D understanding.

riffusion.name: Riffusion
riffusion.description: Riffusion pioneered AI music generation by treating audio as visual spectrograms. Their innovative approach fine-tuned Stable Diffusion on spectrogram images, creating the first model that could generate music from text prompts in real-time.

magnific.name: Magnific AI
magnific.description: Magnific AI specializes in AI image upscaling and enhancement with remarkable detail preservation. Their technology can increase image resolution while hallucinating plausible fine details, transforming low-resolution images into stunning high-resolution artwork.

freepik_ai.name: Freepik AI
freepik_ai.description: Freepik AI brings generative AI to the world's largest stock content platform. With millions of assets and AI-powered generation tools, they help designers create custom images, vectors, and 3D content for any project.
freepik_ai.founders: Alejandro Blanes, Pablo Blanes, Joaquin Cuenca

zed.name: Zed Industries
zed.description: Zed is the high-performance code editor built by the creators of Atom. Their GPU-accelerated editor is designed for speed and collaboration, with native AI integration for code generation and conversation.
zed.founders: Nathan Sobo, Max Brunsfeld, Antonio Scandurra (ex-Atom/GitHub)

supermaven.name: Supermaven
supermaven.description: Supermaven delivers the fastest code completions with a 1 million token context window. Founded by the creator of Tabnine, their technology processes codebases 100x faster than competitors for instant, accurate suggestions.

codestory.name: CodeStory (Aide)
codestory.description: Codestory is building an AI-native IDE designed from the ground up for AI-assisted development. Their editor treats AI as a first-class citizen, enabling fluid collaboration between developers and AI throughout the coding workflow.

continue_dev.name: Continue
continue_dev.description: Continue is the leading open-source AI code assistant that works with any LLM and IDE. Developers customize it for their workflows.

all_hands.name: All Hands AI (OpenHands)
all_hands.description: All Hands AI (OpenHands) is building an open-source platform for AI software engineers. Their agents can browse the web, write code, and execute commands, handling complex development tasks autonomously.

factory_ai.name: Factory
factory_ai.description: Factory AI provides Droids, AI agents that autonomously fix bugs and implement features. Their platform assigns coding tasks to AI that handles the full development cycle, from understanding issues to creating pull requests.

codegen.name: Codegen
codegen.description: Codegen provides AI agents that automate software development workflows. Their platform integrates with your codebase and tools to handle repetitive development tasks with minimal human oversight.

ellipsis.name: Ellipsis
ellipsis.description: Ellipsis automates code reviews and documentation with AI. Their GitHub integration provides instant, intelligent review comments and keeps documentation synchronized with code changes.

greptile.name: Greptile
greptile.description: Greptile provides AI that understands your entire codebase. Their platform indexes repositories and enables natural language queries, code reviews, and documentation generation with full contextual awareness.

genesis_med.name: Genesis AI Medicine
genesis_med.description: Genesis AI develops AI for drug discovery and computational medicine. Their platform accelerates therapeutic development by simulating biological systems with machine learning.

noetik_ai.name: Noetik AI
noetik_ai.description: Noetik AI uses multimodal AI to accelerate drug discovery and development. Their platform analyzes diverse biological data to identify promising therapeutic approaches and predict clinical outcomes.

profluent.name: Profluent Bio
profluent.description: Profluent designs proteins with AI, creating new biological functions not found in nature. Their generative technology enables engineering of enzymes, antibodies, and other proteins for medicine and industry.

chai_discovery.name: Chai Discovery
chai_discovery.description: Chai Discovery provides AI infrastructure for drug discovery. Their open platform enables researchers to predict molecular structures and properties, accelerating pharmaceutical research worldwide.

evo_design.name: EvolutionaryScale (ESM)
evo_design.description: EvolutionaryScale develops biological foundation models for protein design. Their ESM3 model predicts protein structure and function to accelerate drug discovery.

nvidia_bionemo.name: NVIDIA BioNeMo
nvidia_bionemo.description: NVIDIA's platform for generative AI in drug discovery.

cradle_bio.name: Cradle Bio
cradle_bio.description: Cradle uses AI to engineer proteins for better performance. Their platform optimizes protein sequences for desired properties, accelerating development of biologics and industrial enzymes.
cradle_bio.founders: Stef van Grieken, Elise de Reus, Massimo Bellini

skild_ai.name: Skild AI
skild_ai.description: Skild AI is building a general-purpose foundation model for robotics. Their AI aims to enable robots to learn and adapt to new tasks without specific programming, bringing LLM-like generalization to physical AI.

field_ai.name: Field AI
field_ai.description: Field AI provides autonomy software for robots operating in challenging real-world environments. Their technology enables robots to navigate and work in complex, unstructured settings.

formic.name: Formic
formic.description: Formic makes industrial robots accessible through Robots-as-a-Service. Their model eliminates upfront costs, enabling manufacturers of any size to automate with pay-per-hour robot labor.

diligent_robotics.name: Diligent Robotics
diligent_robotics.description: Diligent Robotics builds autonomous robots for healthcare. Their Moxi robot handles hospital logistics tasks, delivering supplies so nurses can focus on patient care.

serve_robotics.name: Serve Robotics
serve_robotics.description: Serve Robotics operates autonomous sidewalk delivery robots. Their fleet delivers food and essentials in urban areas, providing fast, sustainable last-mile delivery for restaurants and retailers.

miso_robotics.name: Miso Robotics
miso_robotics.description: Miso Robotics creates AI-powered kitchen automation with robots like Flippy. Their technology automates food preparation tasks, addressing labor challenges in the restaurant industry.

crusoe_energy.name: Crusoe Energy
crusoe_energy.description: Crusoe Energy converts stranded natural gas into clean computing power for AI workloads. Their data centers run on otherwise-wasted energy, providing sustainable GPU compute while reducing methane emissions from oil fields.

voltage_park.name: Voltage Park
voltage_park.description: Voltage Park provides GPU cloud infrastructure at scale for AI training. With one of the largest independent GPU clusters outside the hyperscalers, they offer the compute capacity needed for training frontier AI models.

nscale.name: Nscale
nscale.description: NScale provides GPU cloud infrastructure optimized for AI workloads across Europe. Their sustainable data centers offer NVIDIA GPUs with a focus on data sovereignty and environmental responsibility.

leena_ai.name: Leena AI
leena_ai.description: Leena AI provides autonomous AI agents for employee service. Their platform handles HR, IT, and finance queries, resolving issues without human intervention and improving employee experience.
leena_ai.founders: Adit Jain, Mayank Goyal, Anand Prajapati

tidio.name: Tidio
tidio.description: Tidio combines live chat, chatbots, and AI to help businesses communicate with customers. Their platform serves hundreds of thousands of businesses with automated responses and real-time support.

rasa.name: Rasa
rasa.description: Rasa provides the open-source framework for building contextual AI assistants. Their platform enables enterprises to create custom conversational AI with full control over data and deployment.

cresta.name: Cresta
cresta.description: Cresta uses AI to make every customer conversation better. Their real-time coaching and automation helps contact center agents resolve issues faster, improving both efficiency and satisfaction.
cresta.founders: Zayd Enam, Tim Shi (Stanford AI Lab)

qualtrics_xm.name: Qualtrics
qualtrics_xm.description: Qualtrics is the experience management platform that helps organizations measure and improve customer, employee, product, and brand experiences. Their AI-powered analytics turn feedback into actionable insights.
qualtrics_xm.founders: Ryan Smith, Jared Smith, Scott Smith, Stuart Orgill

assembled.name: Assembled
assembled.description: Assembled provides workforce management for modern support teams. Their AI-powered platform optimizes scheduling, forecasting, and performance for customer service organizations at scale.
assembled.founders: Ryan Wang, John Wang, Brian Sze (ex-Stripe)

observe_ai.name: Observe.AI
observe_ai.description: Observe.AI transforms contact centers with conversation intelligence. Their platform analyzes every customer interaction, providing coaching insights and automation that improve agent performance.

gong_io.name: Gong.io
gong_io.description: Gong captures and analyzes customer interactions using AI, providing revenue intelligence that helps sales teams win more deals. Their platform reveals what top performers do differently.

chorus_ai.name: ZoomInfo (Chorus)
chorus_ai.description: Conversation intelligence platform acquired by ZoomInfo.

clari.name: Clari
clari.description: Clari provides revenue operations and forecasting powered by AI. Their platform analyzes activity data to predict deals, identify risks, and help revenue teams hit their numbers.

highspot.name: Highspot
highspot.description: Highspot provides AI-powered sales enablement and content management. Their platform helps sales teams find the right materials and insights to close deals faster.
highspot.founders: Robert Wahbe, David Wortendyke, Oliver Sharp

exa_ai.name: Exa (Metaphor)
exa_ai.description: Exa (formerly Metaphor) provides neural search that understands meaning, not just keywords. Their API enables AI applications to find relevant content with human-like understanding of queries.

tavily.name: Tavily
tavily.description: Tavily provides the search API built for AI agents. Their platform enables LLMs to search the web and retrieve relevant, structured information for real-time knowledge.

andi_search.name: Andi
andi_search.description: Andi is the AI search assistant that provides direct answers instead of links. Their conversational search experience explains topics, summarizes content, and protects user privacy.

globe_search.name: Globe
globe_search.description: Globe Engineer (Globe Search) provides AI-powered search that understands natural language queries. Their technology enables more intuitive information discovery across enterprise and consumer applications.

protect_ai.name: Protect AI
protect_ai.description: Protect AI provides security solutions for machine learning systems. Their platform scans ML pipelines for vulnerabilities, enabling enterprises to deploy AI with confidence in its security.

hidden_layer.name: HiddenLayer

hidden_layer.founders: Chris Sestito, Jim Ballard, Tanner Burns

lakera.name: Lakera
lakera.description: Lakera protects AI applications from prompt injection and other LLM security threats. Their Lakera Guard acts as a firewall for AI, blocking malicious inputs and ensuring safe model behavior.
lakera.founders: David Dao, Matthias Kraft, Severin Klinger

aim_security.name: Aim Security
aim_security.description: Aim Security enables enterprises to adopt AI safely. Their platform provides visibility into AI usage, prevents data leaks, and ensures compliance with security and privacy requirements.

ramp.name: Ramp
ramp.description: Ramp is the corporate card and spend management platform that uses AI to save companies money. Their software automatically finds savings, enforces policies, and streamlines expense management.

brex.name: Brex
brex.description: Brex provides AI-powered corporate cards and spend management for startups and enterprises. Their platform combines payments, expense management, and travel into one intelligent system.

mercury.name: Mercury
mercury.description: Mercury provides banking for startups with powerful software and API access. Their platform combines business banking with financial tools that help growing companies manage and move money.

stripe_ai.name: Stripe (AI)
stripe_ai.description: Stripe uses AI across payments infrastructure for fraud detection and optimization. Their machine learning models protect billions of transactions and improve conversion rates.

motherduck.name: MotherDuck
motherduck.description: MotherDuck brings DuckDB to the cloud, enabling serverless analytical SQL. Their platform combines the simplicity of local analysis with the power of the cloud for collaborative data work.

preset.name: Preset
preset.description: Preset provides managed Apache Superset, the open-source business intelligence platform. Their cloud service enables teams to explore data and build dashboards without managing BI infrastructure.
preset.founders: Maxime Beauchemin (creator of Airflow and Superset)

einblick.name: Einblick
einblick.description: Einblick is the AI-native data analytics platform that transforms how teams analyze data. Their visual, collaborative canvas enables faster insights with AI assistance throughout the analytical workflow.

rasgo.name: Rasgo
rasgo.description: Rasgo accelerates feature engineering for machine learning with an AI-powered transformation layer. Their platform sits on your data warehouse, enabling data scientists to create features with natural language.

bardeen.name: Bardeen
bardeen.description: Bardeen automates repetitive tasks across web applications with AI. Their browser extension enables anyone to create automations by demonstrating actions, no coding required.

activepieces.name: Activepieces
activepieces.description: Activepieces is the open-source alternative to Zapier for workflow automation. Their platform enables businesses to connect apps and automate processes with full control over data and deployment.

etched.name: Etched
etched.description: Etched builds AI chips specialized for transformer inference. Their Sohu chip is designed specifically for modern AI architectures, promising dramatic performance improvements over general-purpose GPUs.
etched.founders: Gavin Uberti, Chris Zhu, Robert Wachen

rain_ai.name: Rain AI
rain_ai.description: Rain AI develops neuromorphic chips inspired by the brain's efficiency. Their technology promises AI processing with dramatically lower power consumption, enabling AI in edge devices.

lightmatter.name: Lightmatter
lightmatter.description: Lightmatter builds photonic AI accelerators that use light instead of electrons. Their chips enable faster, more efficient AI computation, addressing the power constraints of modern data centers.

positron_ai.name: Positron AI
positron_ai.description: Positron AI develops AI agents for customer service and enterprise automation. Their technology handles complex conversations and tasks across business workflows.

matx.name: MatX
matx.description: MatX builds AI accelerator chips optimized for transformer inference. Their specialized hardware aims to reduce the cost of deploying large language models.

waabi.name: Waabi
waabi.description: Waabi uses AI simulation to develop autonomous trucking. Their approach trains self-driving systems primarily in simulation, dramatically reducing the real-world miles needed for safe deployment.
waabi.founders: Raquel Urtasun (Uber ATG, U of Toronto)

gatik.name: Gatik
gatik.description: Gatik operates autonomous box trucks for middle-mile logistics. Their AI-powered vehicles transport goods between distribution centers and retail stores on fixed routes.
gatik.founders: Gautam Narang, Arjun Narang, Apeksha Kumavat

stack_av.name: Stack AV
stack_av.description: Stack AV is building autonomous trucking technology for the long haul. Their approach combines advanced AI with purpose-built trucks designed for driverless highway operation.

kodiak_robotics.name: Kodiak Robotics
kodiak_robotics.description: Kodiak Robotics develops autonomous trucking technology for long-haul freight. Their trucks are designed to operate without safety drivers on highways, addressing the driver shortage in logistics.

may_mobility.name: May Mobility
may_mobility.description: May Mobility provides autonomous shuttle services for communities. Their transit solutions bring self-driving transportation to cities, campuses, and airports with a focus on accessibility.

saildrone.name: Saildrone
saildrone.description: Saildrone operates autonomous surface vessels that collect ocean data at scale. Their fleet of unmanned sailboats monitors weather, tracks marine life, and provides maritime domain awareness.

vannevar_labs.name: Vannevar Labs
vannevar_labs.description: Vannevar Labs builds AI systems for defense and national security. Their technology helps analysts process intelligence data, enabling faster and better-informed decisions for government missions.

rebellion_defense.name: Rebellion Defense
rebellion_defense.description: Rebellion Defense applies AI to military and defense applications. Their Nova software helps defense organizations analyze data and enhance decision-making.
rebellion_defense.founders: Chris Lynch, Nicole Camarillo, Oliver Lewis

epirus.name: Epirus

neets_ai.name: Neets.ai

fish_audio.name: Fish Audio

cartesia.name: Cartesia

marblism.name: Marblism

screenshot_to_code.name: Picography (Screenshot to Code)
screenshot_to_code.description: Screenshot to Code converts website images into functional HTML and CSS code. Their AI analyzes designs and generates pixel-perfect implementations, bridging the gap between design and development.

cleerly.name: Cleerly

lensa.name: Prisma Labs (Lensa)

artbreeder.name: Artbreeder

botpress.name: Botpress

cognigy.name: Cognigy
cognigy.description: Cognigy provides enterprise conversational AI for customer and employee service. Their platform builds AI agents that handle complex dialogues across voice and chat.

kore_ai.name: Kore.ai
kore_ai.description: Kore.ai delivers enterprise conversational AI and virtual assistant platforms. Their no-code tools help businesses build AI agents for customer support and HR tasks.

truefoundry.name: TrueFoundry
truefoundry.description: TrueFoundry helps enterprises deploy and manage ML models at scale. Their platform provides the infrastructure layer between data science teams and production, with governance and monitoring for enterprise AI.

union_ai.name: Union.ai

arcee_ai.name: Arcee AI
arcee_ai.description: Arcee AI helps enterprises fine-tune and customize language models on their proprietary data. Their platform enables domain adaptation of open-source models, creating specialized AI assistants for specific industries and use cases.

cerebrium.name: Cerebrium
cerebrium.description: Cerebrium is a serverless GPU platform that makes deploying and scaling ML models effortless. Their infrastructure handles the complexity of GPU orchestration, letting teams focus on building AI products rather than managing infrastructure.

algolia.name: Algolia
algolia.description: Algolia provides lightning-fast search APIs used by thousands of companies. Their AI-powered search understands user intent and delivers relevant results in milliseconds.

typesense.name: Typesense

robocorp.description: Robocorp provides open-source tools for intelligent automation. Their Python-based platform enables developers to build, deploy, and manage automation bots that work alongside AI.

domo.name: Domo

thoughtspot.name: ThoughtSpot
